channel.title: Can the client be used to
channel.description: Can the client be used to connect to other mine craft servers that arnt the official moparscape one as im having difficulties doing so

item.title: Can the client be used to
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

Thanks Graham and sittion why would i post on a official website for the game if im using a pirated version that would not be very smart

Read full topic
item.source: Can the client be used to

item.title: Can the client be used to
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

If you are using the pirated version and you try to connect to a server which has name validation (i.e. it contacts the central minecraft authentication server) you won’t be able to connect to it, hence why you get the ‘not a premium member’ error.

Read full topic
item.source: Can the client be used to

item.title: Can the client be used to
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:3, topic:377040”]Well its not working for me… here a few errors i get and i have not bought minecraft

Not a Premium Member
Unknown Host “IPHERE”

I keep getting one of those errors while trying to connect to other servers[/quote]Then the server is not online.

Read full topic
item.source: Can the client be used to

item.title: Can the client be used to
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:2, topic:377040”]No. The official client used by thousands of other people to connect to servers the same way we do without any client-sided changes whatsoever can only connect to the MoparScape server.

Yes, obviously.[/quote]

Depends if the server is online/offline players only.

Read full topic
